Class PlayerSettingsHandler

java.lang.Object
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.NBTHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.FriendSupportingHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.PlayerSettingsHandler
public final class PlayerSettingsHandler extends FriendSupportingHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
A simple handler to get a player's BlockProt settings.
Since:
0.2.3

    PLAYER_HAS_INTERACTED_WITH_MENU

  • Method Details

    • getLockOnPlace

      public boolean getLockOnPlace()
      Check if the player wants their blocks to be locked when placed.
      Returns:
      Will return the default setting from the config, or the value the player has set it to.
      Since:
      0.2.3

    • setLockOnPlace

      public void setLockOnPlace(boolean lockOnPlace)
      Set the value of the lock on place setting. If true, the player wants to lock any block right after placing it.
      Parameters:
      lockOnPlace - The boolean value to set it to.
      Since:
      0.2.3

    • preFriendReadCallback

      protected void preFriendReadCallback()
      We are switching to a similar system that BlockNBTHandler uses. To retain compatibility and upgradability with older versions we will try to remap the previous data to the new data structure.
      Overrides:
      preFriendReadCallback in class FriendSupportingHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • getSearchHistory

      public List<String> getSearchHistory()
      Get the current search history for this player.
      Returns:
      A list of UUIDs for each player this player has searched for.

    • clearSearchHistory

      public void clearSearchHistory()
      Clears the search history by removing the list completely.
      Since:

    • hasPlayerInteractedWithMenu

      public boolean hasPlayerInteractedWithMenu()
      Get whether this player has interacted with any of the plugin's menus before.
      Returns:
      true if the player has interacted with a menu at least once.

    • setHasPlayerInteractedWithMenu

      public void setHasPlayerInteractedWithMenu(boolean bool)
      Sets whether this player has interacted with any of the plugin's menus before. Toggleable in order to allow re-enabling of hints.

    • mergeHandler

      public void mergeHandler(@NotNull @NotNull NBTHandler<?> handler)
